svt_mem_sequence Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_mem_sequence:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for all SVT mem sequences. Because of the mem nature of the protocol, the direction of requests (REQ) and responses (RSP) is reversed from the usual sequencer/driver flow.
